abstract: The top executive of French drug maker Sanofi-Aventis reached out to Boston-area researchers and biotechnology start-ups, offering “partnerships for innovation” that could range from investing in drugs to outright acquisitions, The Boston Globe reported.
snippet: The top executive of French drug maker Sanofi-Aventis reached out to Boston-area researchers and biotechnology start-ups, offering “partnerships for innovation” that could range from investing in drugs to outright acquisitions, The Boston Globe re...
lead_paragraph: The top executive of the French drug maker Sanofi-Aventis reached out to Boston-area researchers and biotechnology start-up companies on Wednesday, offering “partnerships for innovation’’ that could range from investments in drugs to outright acquisitions, The Boston Globe reported.
